name: Jade Cutter
description:
Jade cutting is hard work some times! No matter hard you try to wrangle those little things, they always just jump away! They're pretty picky about where they like to settle down, too. Only the finest soil will do! No grass, no rocks, no cobblestone, nothing! Just dirt!

Slice chunks of Jade off to propagate new plants! Make it to the goal and try to land only in the dirt!

Controls:

Left click and drag to slice!
Right click and drag to move camera!
Escape to restart or quit! (Hoo boi there's some bugs in here)
